Text:
I am an android developer.
I get a image from intenet in my app and then save it in my external storage of my device.but unfortunately android resizes it to a smaller image and I don't want it.here is my code while saving image.

private void SaveImage(Bitmap finalBitmap, int n) {

            String root = Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory().toString();
            File myDir = new File(root + "/TinGroup");
            myDir.mkdirs();
            Random generator = new Random();

            String fname = "Image-" + n + ".jpg";
            File file = new File(myDir, fname);
            if (file.exists()) file.delete();
            try {
                FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(file);
                finalBitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, out);

                out.flush();
                out.close();

            } catch (Exception e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }

I am an android developer.
I get a image from intenet in my app and then save it in my external storage of my device.but unfortunately android resizes it to a smaller image and I don't want it.here is my code while saving image.

    private void SaveImage(Bitmap finalBitmap, int n) {

        String root = Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory().toString();
        File myDir = new File(root + "/TinGroup");
        myDir.mkdirs();
        Random generator = new Random();

        String fname = "Image-" + n + ".jpg";
        File file = new File(myDir, fname);
        if (file.exists()) file.delete();
        try {
            FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(file);
            finalBitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, out);

            out.flush();
            out.close();

        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
